[[=]]
[[div style="color:#8b0000;"]]
+ [[size 150%]]MetalRavioli[[/size]]
[[/div]]
[[/=]]
[[=]]
[[size 85%]] Pronouns: she/they[[/size]]
[[size 85%]][[collapsible show="+ Things people have said about me"hide="- Things people have said about me but collapsed"]][[/size]]
[[/=]]
[[<]]
> [[*user MoreMuffins]] said "I have no idea who you are. +1"
> 
> [[*user Ralliston]] said "I remember the sonic-villain-whatever-his-name-was profile picture you. You cannot escape from me."
> 
> [[*user NebulousStar]] said "Ravioli, ravioli, give me all your money-oli."
> 
> [[*user gee0765]] said "Ravioli can't be metal that's literally impossible."
> 
> [[*user Aftokrator]] said "According to all known laws of Italian cuisine, there is no way ravioli can be made with metal."
> 
> [[*user CaliBold]] said "Of course, ravioli is made of metal anyway, because Italians don't care what humans think."
> 
> [[*user Uncle Nicolini]] said "ravioli the bitchless"
> 
> [[*user TheDarkArtist]] said "more like basedravioli"
> 
> [[*user Cole 13]] said "cum author"
> 
> [[*user Synthpanda_]] said "fuck you metal ravioli"
> 
> [[*user Erminustay]] said "ravioli... yummers"
> 
> [[*user winkwonkboi]] said "fartal ravioli"
> 
> [[*user DrNBurr]] said "Upvote the metallic pasta"
> 
> [[*user Old One Goaelat]] said "are u edible?"
> 
> [[*user ParallelPotatoes]] said "metalravioli. is it iron? copper? brass? steel? No one knows. All we know is that the ravioli is some form of metal"
> 
> [[*user Doctor Cimmerian]] said "I understand metalravioli plate of pasta"
[[/<]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[<]]
[[[SCP-6773]]] - "Shadow the Shy Bird"

[[module ListPages name="SCP-6773"]]
**[##green|+%%rating%%##]**
[[/module]]

//We were driving over to Henry's when this huge, and I mean huge vulture came out of nowhere and started attacking the damn truck!//

[[collapsible show="+ Appearances"hide="- Appearances"]]
* [[[Aces And Eights]]] canon
 * [*http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/the-old-hometown-looks-the-same It's Good to Touch the Green, Green Grass of Home] by [[*user TopDownUnder]]
* [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6366 SCP-6366] by [[*user MetalRavioli]]

[[module ListPages name="SCP-6366"]]
**[##green|+%%rating%%##]**
[[/module]]

//Don't worry, I got this. I took condor in community college.//

//You didn't GO to community college!//

[[collapsible show="+ Appearances"hide="- Appearances"]]

//You made Animal Jam?//

//For fucks sake.//

[[[SCP-6447]]] - "Sinners' Symphony"
[[size 75%]]Mega-collaboration with [[*user Jack Waltz]], [[*user Elunerazim]], [[*user MoreMuffins]], [[*user Aftokrator]], [[*user LORDXVNV]], [[*user Lt Flops]], [[*user GreenGolem]], [[*user Cole 13]] and [[*user Jakdragonx]].[[/size]]
[[module ListPages name="SCP-6447"]]
**[##green|+%%rating%%##]**
[[/module]]

//97% of Foundation clairvoyants believe the formation of SCP-6447, and its ritualistic and melodic nature, exist to appease an **##d1423d|Emergent Eschatological Entity##** (henceforth referred to as **##d1423d|EEE-6447##**) being awakened by humanity's collective transgressions.//

[[collapsible show="+ Appearances"hide="- Appearances"]]
* [*https://wanderers-library.wikidot.com/a-soul-embracing-eee A Soul, Embracing EEE] by [[*user LORDXVNV]]
* [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/thereven-germination THEREVEN: GERMINATION] by [[*user LORDXVNV]]
[[/collapsible]]

------

[[[SCP-7018]]] - "The Long Winding Road"
[[size 75%]]Collaboration with [[*user Cole 13]] and [[*user TopDownUnder]][[/size]]
[[size 75%]][[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/scp7000contesthub/logo.png width="15" height="15"]] [[[scp7000contesthub|SCP-7000 Contest]]] entry[[/size]]

[[module ListPages name="scp-7018"]]
**[##green|+%%rating%%##]**
[[/module]]

//SCP-7018 has been shown opening wormholes of varying sizes. These wormholes grant access to assorted 'multiverses'. These wormholes seem to open at times of need, with objects that are useful in different circumstances.//

------

[[=]]
[[div style="color:grey;"]]
+ My Will
[[/div]]
[[/=]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
If something ever happens to me, like if I die or get permanently banned, or am unable to be contacted[[span class="fnnum"]].[[/span]][[span class="fncon"]][[*user Georgiethefrog]] has my phone number, and I can otherwise be contacted on my discord, which is #MetalRavioli.[[/span]] for 3 years, all my articles shall go to NO ONE bitch I am eternal. Except for my collaborations, they will go to their respective co-authors. If I do die though I expect annual material offerings to keep my soul tethered to this realm.
[[/div]]
